Campaign Kit Android 0.12.2
  • Prev Package

  • All Classes

Package com.radiusnetworks.campaignkit

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CampaignKitNotifier
    The CampaignKitNotifier keeps your app informed when a nearby beacon or geofence has triggered one of your campaigns.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Campaign
    The Campaign class represents a single Campaign created within your Kit.
    CampaignKitManager
    This is the primary entry point for the Campaign Kit subsystem.
    CampaignKitNotifier.CKEventType
    Category for the type of event causing a call to CampaignKitNotifier.didDetectPlace(Place, CKEventType).
    CampaignNotificationBuilder
    The CampaignNotificationBuilder class displays data representing a single campaign.
    Configuration
    Configuration settings for a Campaign Kit.
    Place
    The Place class represents a single Place created within your Kit.
    Place.PlaceType
